frontmatter.title: Short Video Recording and Editing App

node.html: Clone of a popular short video application called Moj made with Flutter and video processing is done with the help of flutter package flutter_ffmpeg.
Website for a security services start-up created with bootstrap studio and hosted on Netlify. Contact form is managed with EmailJS.
A simple to use Git CLI automation using python and bash commands where you can stage, commit and push to upstream repository with just one command.
Quit smoking mobile application with cigarette log, daily journal, time smoke free and an offline first app which sync data online to firebase.

An app to help farmers sow seeds and get updates when to do what. This was for new farmers who are not aware much about farming. This currently contains only one crop and very basic features just for the proof of concept which we are also unaware of.
